snippet.title: A Death in the Red Light - Official Trailer | IGN Live 2024
snippet.description:
Amsterdam, 1988. A dead body in the Red Light District, the Dutch capital of sex and drugs, is a washed-up detective’s one shot at redemption. Explore the seedy underbelly of Europe’s most notorious city, solve complex puzzles, crack the case - all the while experiencing Amsterdam at its worst!

Presented by indie.io

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive
